Title: This Is Real
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Lauren Schmidt, Salvatore Stabile, Vladimir Cvetko (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost and Tasha's rift intensifies. Ghost is worried his family may be in danger, when he continues to pursue Angela.
